title: Research Topic: Democratic Institution Feedback Loop Crisis (2020-present)
summary: Based on the research priority 'Democratic Institution Feedback Loop Crisis (2020-present)', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Analyze how Putin's reverse capture created systematic cycles strengthening authoritarianism while weakening democracy globally... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
